info.title: FortiOS Monitor
info.description: REST API for configuring FortiOS objects and settings

post.summary:
Clear IKE gateways.
Access Group: vpngrp

400.description: Bad Request: Request cannot be processed by the API

401.description: Not Authorized: Request without successful login session

403.description: Forbidden: Request is missing CSRF token or administrator is missing access profile permissions.

404.description: Resource Not Found: Unable to find the specified resource.

405.description: Method Not Allowed: Specified HTTP method is not allowed for this resource.

413.description: Request Entity Too Large: Request cannot be processed due to large entity

424.description: Failed Dependency: Fail dependency can be duplicate resource, missing required parameter, missing required attribute, invalid attribute value

429.description: Access temporarily blocked: Maximum failed authentications reached. The offended source is temporarily blocked for certain amount of time.

500.description: Internal Server Error: Internal error when processing the request

parameters.name: body
parameters.description: Possible parameters to go in the body for the request.

mkey.description: Name of the IKE gateway to clear.

get.summary:
Return the connection counts for every ipsec tunnel.
Access Group: vpngrp

schema.title: VPN IPsec Tunnel Connection Counts
schema.description: Connection counts for every IPsec tunnel.

items.title: Connection Count
items.description: The connection count object for the phase1 tunnel.

name.title: Tunnel Name
name.description: The name of the phase1 tunnel or the connection name when no parent tunnel exists for the connection.

get.summary:
Return an array of active IPsec VPNs.
Access Group: vpngrp

is_ocvpn.title: Is OCVPN
is_ocvpn.description: True if this is an OCVPN.

creation_time.title: Creation Time
creation_time.description: Seconds elapsed since the tunnel was created.

user_two_factor_auth.title: Two Factor Authentication
user_two_factor_auth.description: True when two factor authentication is in use.

get.summary:
Retrieve a list of all Agentless VPN sessions and sub-sessions.
Access Group: vpngrp

schema.title: Agentless VPN Sessions and Sub-Sessions
schema.description: List all Agentless VPN sessions and sub-sessions.

group_name.title: Group Name
group_name.description: Name of the group the user is part of.

remote_host.title: Remote Host
remote_host.description: IP address of the remote host.

two_factor_auth.title: Two-Factor Authentication
two_factor_auth.description: True when the user is using two-factor authentication.
